title: Wheels are skidding: Why Indiaâ€™s exports of two-wheelers and three-wheelers are falling
description: Two-wheeler exports fell to 34.06 lakh units in April 2022-February 2023 from 40.9 lakh in April 2021-February 2022, a 16% drop, according to the Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers (SIAM). In the case of three-wheelers, exports fell to 3.46 lakh units in April 2022-February 2023 from 4.61 lakh units in April 2021-February 2022, a 24% decline.
